title: Proposal Framework Tool - AIM
description: Creating robust Catalyst proposals should be easier. +75% proposals don't win Catalyst funds costing assessors + proposers time + resources.
solution: Provide a tool that guides proposers through the process with access to numerous frameworks that assist with structure.
experience: AIM members are the team behind the voter-tool, CA-tool, vCA-Tool. Educators, developers, designers and data experts.
